fields.description: The default Miro Community theme.  This receives updates from the Miro Community developers.
fields.name: Miro Community List Current

fields.description: Replaces the front page with a version that scrolls through the three most recent featured videos. This receives updates from the Miro Community developers.
fields.name: Miro Community Scrolling Current

fields.description: Replaces the front page with a version that scrolls through the three most recent featured videos and lists the categories.  This receives updates from the Miro Community developers.
fields.name: Miro Community Category Current

fields.description: New theme with a more blog-y style.  This receives updates from the Miro Community developers.
fields.name: Miro Community Blue Theme Current
